TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHttpSessionState

summary.span: 定义协定以实现自定义会话状态容器。

span.span: Defines the contract to implement a custom session-state container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话状态容器提供当前会话的会话状态值和相关信息的访问权限。A session-state container provides access to the session-state values and related information for the current session. 会话状态容器中包含的会话信息 使用属性通过类向应用程序代码公开。Session information included in a session-state container is exposed to application code through the class using the property. 类是会话状态容器的包装类。The class is a wrapper class for a session-state container. 会话状态容器的 ASP.NET 实现是类。The ASP.NET implementation of a session-state container is the class. 在请求开始时, 在事件发生时, 创建和填充对象并将其分配给当前。At the beginning of a request, during the event, the creates and populates an object and assigns it to the current . 在请求结束时, 在事件期间, 从当前检索对象并执行任何所需的会话工作, 如将会话值写入到会话存储区, 或者放弃会议.At the end of a request, during the event, the retrieves the object from the current and performs any required session work, such as writing the session values to the session store, or abandoning the session. 如果请求突然终止 (如通过重定向), 则通过调用方法来执行相同的清理。If the request is abruptly terminated, such as through a redirect, the performs the same cleanup by calling the method. 若要创建自定义会话状态容器, 请创建实现接口的类。To create a custom session-state container, create a class that implements the interface. 如果要创建自己的自定义会话状态容器, 则还必须将替换为你自己的自定义模块。If you are creating your own custom session-state container, you must also replace the with your own custom module. 自定义模块将创建自定义会话状态容器的实例, 并 使用方法将其添加到当前。Your custom module will create an instance of your custom session-state container and add it to the current using the method. 类概述中包含自定义会话状态模块的示例。An example of a custom session-state module is included in the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现了接口, 以创建名为`MySessionState`的新会话状态容器类。The following code example implements the interface to create a new session-state container class named `MySessionState`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/CS/mysessionstate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/VB/mysessionstate.vb#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Abandon() cil managed

summary.span: 结束当前会话。

span.span: Ends the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于清除会话数据并引发 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中定义的 Session_OnEnd 事件。 The method is used to clear out session data and raise the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现了接口的方法。The following code example implements the method of the interface. 此代码示例复制类的行为, 因为它添加了一个在调用方法时设置为`true`的属性。The code example duplicates the behavior of the class in that it adds an property that is set to `true` when the method is called. 在事件发生时, 会话状态模块会检查 属性,以确定会话是否已被放弃,并且会话状态模块会清除会话数据并执行Session_OnEnd 事件。The property is checked by the session-state module during the event to determine whether the session has been abandoned, and the session-state module clears out session data and executes the **Session_OnEnd** event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/CS/mysessionstate.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/VB/mysessionstate.vb#8)]

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CodePage { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CodePage : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前会话的代码页标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the code-page identifier for the current session.

value.span: 当前会话的代码页标识符。

span.span: The code-page identifier for the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符集 (代码页) 用于解释多字节字符数据、确定字符值和排序顺序。A character set (code page) is used to interpret multi-byte character data, determining character value, and therefore sort order. 代码页设置仅适用于多字节字符数据, 不适用于 Unicode 字符数据。Code-page settings apply only to multi-byte character data, not to Unicode character data. 提供此属性是为了与 ASP 的早期版本兼容。This property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果不需要保持与 ASP 页的向后兼容性, 请改用属性的属性。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property of the property instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现了接口的属性, 以获取和设置当前响应的编码。The following code example implements the property of the interface to get and set the encoding for the current response. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/CS/mysessionstate.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/VB/mysessionstate.vb#10)]

span.span: One of the values that indicate whether the application is configured for cookieless sessions.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回一个枚举值, 该值基于配置元素的`cookieless`属性的值。 The property returns a enumeration value that is based on the value of the `cookieless` attribute of the configuration element. `true` 如果特性设置为, 则属性将返回; 否则, 该属性将返回。 `cookieless`If the `cookieless` attribute is set to `true`, then the property returns ; otherwise, the property returns . ## Examples 下面的代码示例`cookieless` `true`在 web.config 文件中将[sessionState 元素 (ASP.NET 设置架构)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d)元素的特性设置为, 以更改属性。The following code example sets the `cookieless` attribute of the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) element to `true` in the Web.config file to change the property. 对于此示例应用程序配置, 属性将返回。For this sample application configuration, the property would return . ``` ```

summary.span: 获取或设置当前会话的区域设置标识符 (LCID)。

span.span: Gets or sets the locale identifier (LCID) of the current session.

value.span: 指定当前会话的区域性的 实例。

span.span: A instance that specifies the culture of the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供`LCID`此属性是为了与 ASP 的早期版本兼容。This `LCID` property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果不需要保持与 ASP 页面的向后兼容性, 请改用属性。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead. ASP.NET 不会将区域设置标识符存储在会话状态中。ASP.NET does not store the locale identifier in session state. 属性调用以获取和设置标识符。The property calls the to get and set the identifier. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现了接口的属性, 以获取和设置当前页的区域设置标识符。The following code example implements the property of the interface to get and set the locale identifier for the current page. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Timeout { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Timeout : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在会话状态提供程序终止会话之前各请求之间所允许的超时期限（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the time-out period (in minutes) allowed between requests before the session-state provider terminates the session.

value.span: 超时期限（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: The time-out period, in minutes.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现了接口的属性, 以获取和设置存储在类构造函数中创建的内部变量中的会话超时值。The following code example implements the property of the interface to get and set the session timeout value that is stored in an internal variable created in the class constructor.
